titleStmt.title: Despatch from Francisco Joaquim Ferreira d'Amaral, October 10, 1883

bibl.title: Despatch from Robert S. Newton to Assistant Secretary of State
Despatches from United States Consuls in St Paul Loanda

div1.p: Having come to my knowledge the highly distinguished manner in which the Commander of the Corvette "Rainha da Portugal", Captain Guilherme Augusto de Bribo Capello, of the Royal Navy, has executed the Commission untrusted to him to effect the peaceful occupation of a vast portion of the territory north of the paralell 5" 12' South latitude, and placing this brilliant act of the Commander of the "Rainha da Portugal by the Side of the men to whom the Province of Angola owes the greatest gratitude for important Services rendered: I must give praise to the said Commander of the Corvette, Rainha da Portugal, for his devotion to Patriotism and the great ability
